mapper.insert: INSERT INTO champion_post (user_id, champion_id, content, created_at, nickname, is_deleted) VALUES (#{userId}, #{championId}, #{content}, #{createdAt, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{nickname}, false)
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, champion_id, content, created_at, nickname FROM champion_post WHERE champion_id = #{championId} AND is_deleted = false ORDER BY created_at DESC
mapper.update: update champion_post set content = #{content} where id = #{id}
update champion_post set is_deleted = true where id = #{id}
